item.title: 英国储蓄率下降，表明消费者谨慎情绪有所缓解
item.description: 英国消费者在第三季度的储蓄减少，这表明阻碍经济发展的严重谨慎情绪可能正在缓解。【原文：British consumers put away less in savings in the third quarter, a sign that the deep caution that has held back the economy may be easing.】

item.title: 英镑维持在 1.34 美元附近，股市将下挫
俄罗斯对华液化天然气出口创纪录，超过澳大利亚
item.description: 俄罗斯对中国的液化天然气出口在 11 月份飙升至创纪录水平，原因是买家为了获得更便宜的燃料而摆脱了西方制裁的风险。【原文：Russia’s liquefied natural gas exports to China surged to a record in November, as buyers shrugged off the risk of western sanctions to access the cheaper fuel.】

item.title: 印度与新西兰签署今年第三份自由贸易协定
item.description: 印度和新西兰缔结了一项自由贸易协定，这是新德里今年达成的第三项此类协定，尽管与美国和欧盟的谈判仍在拖延。【原文：India and New Zealand concluded a free-trade agreement, the third such pact New Delhi has reached this year even while talks with the US and European Union drag on.】

item.title: 顶级预测师称人民币强势将短暂突破7关口
item.description: 一位顶级货币预测专家说，人民币升值超过每美元 7 元的关键水平很可能是短暂的，部分原因是中国制造商面临的压力和外资流入疲软。【原文：Any yuan appreciation beyond the key 7 per dollar level will likely be short-lived, partly due to pressure on Chinese manufacturers and sluggish foreign investment inflows, a top currency forecaster said.】

item.title: 中国 OpenAI 竞争对手在股票上市前公布销售细节
item.description: 中国的 OpenAI 竞争者 MiniMax 和 Zhipu AI 在上市文件中首次披露了它们的商业模式和盈利前景，与资金雄厚的硅谷同行相比，它们的收入受到了限制。【原文：Chinese OpenAI contenders MiniMax and Zhipu AI offered the first look into their business models and profit prospects in listing filings, revealing revenue constraints compared with their deep-pocketed Silicon Valley peers.】

item.title: 关注俄乌战争，芝加哥小麦走高
item.description: 芝加哥小麦走高，因为交易商一直在关注俄乌战争的最新进展，这是黑海谷物供应的一个关键风险因素。【原文：Chicago wheat edged higher as traders kept watch on the latest developments in the Russia-Ukraine war, a key risk factor for Black Sea grain supplies.】

item.title: 2025 年铜价飙升至每吨 12,000 美元，创下历史新高
item.description: 在贸易动荡、供应紧张和对长期需求持乐观态度的重要一年的尾声，铜价攀升至新纪录，接近每吨 12,000 美元。【原文：Copper climbed to a fresh record and approached $12,000 a ton at the tail end of a momentous year dominated by trade turmoil, tight supply and optimism for long-term demand.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Infini 买入如意股票，避开处罚期限
item.description: 对冲基金公司英飞尼迪资本管理有限公司（Infini Capital Management Ltd.）在周五截止日期前增持了中国如意控股有限公司（China Ruyi Holdings Ltd.）的股票，从而逃脱了 3.2 亿港元（4100 万美元）的罚款。【原文：Hedge fund firm Infini Capital Management Ltd. bought additional shares from China Ruyi Holdings Ltd. by a Friday deadline, escaping a HK$320 million ($41 million) penalty.】

item.title: 中钢集团敦促在铁矿石合同中实行国内定价
item.description: 中国顶级钢铁工业集团敦促国家支持的铁矿石贸易商中国矿产资源集团有限公司在与必和必拓集团（BHP Group）和力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）等大型矿商的供应谈判中推动使用国内价格基准。【原文：China’s top steel industry group has urged the state-backed iron ore trader, China Mineral Resources Group Co., to push for using domestic price benchmarks in supply talks with major miners including BHP Group and Rio Tinto Group.】

item.title: 香港计划为保险公司制定新的加密货币和基础设施规则
item.description: 香港保险业监管局正在提出一系列新规则，以引导保险资金投向包括加密货币和基础设施在内的资产—这一史无前例的举措将把资金转向政府优先发展的行业。【原文：The Hong Kong Insurance Authority is proposing a slate of new rules to channel insurance capital into assets including cryptocurrencies and infrastructure — an unprecedented move that would redirect funds to government‑prioritized sectors.】

item.title: 日本央行加息后日本政府债券延续跌势
item.description: 日本央行将基准利率上调至 30 年来的最高水平后，日本政府债券周一下跌，跌幅扩大。【原文：Japanese government bonds fell on Monday, extending their declines after the Bank of Japan raised its benchmark interest rate to the highest level in 30 years.】

item.title: 日本首相高市支持率保持稳定，中国争端仍在发酵
item.description: 上周末进行的民意调查显示，日本首相高市真奈的支持率稳定在历史最高水平，这表明尽管她上个月就台湾问题发表的言论与中国发生争执，但她的人气依然不减。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s support ratings held steady at historically high levels according to polls conducted over the weekend, in a sign of her continued popularity despite the fallout from a dispute with China over comments she made on Taiwan last month.】

item.title: 美国追捕第三艘油轮加剧了对委内瑞拉的封锁
item.description: 美国在委内瑞拉沿海追捕第三艘油轮，加剧了特朗普政府希望切断委内瑞拉重要经济命脉并孤立总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗政府的封锁行动。【原文：The US’s pursuit of a third oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela has intensified a blockade that the Trump administration hopes will cut off a vital economic lifeline for the country and isolate the government of President Nicolás Maduro.】

item.title: 中国万科进入关键一天，仅剩数小时避免违约
item.description: 中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co., 简称 "万科"）曾是中国最大的开发商，后因前所未有的房地产危机而倒闭。【原文：China Vanke Co., once the country’s biggest developer before it succumbed to an unprecedented property crisis, is heading into one of the most consequential days since it was founded in the 1980s.】

item.title: 澳大利亚要求为本地市场提供多达四分之一的新天然气
item.description: 澳大利亚将要求天然气出口商将多达四分之一的新产量保留给国内使用，因为这个主要供应国正努力应对高昂的价格和人口较多的东海岸预计出现的天然气短缺问题。【原文：Australia will require natural gas exporters to reserve as much as a quarter of new production for domestic use, as the major supplier seeks to tackle high prices and a forecast shortfall on its more populated east coast.】

item.title: 日本央行决议后，日本三村对日元走势发出警告
item.description: 日本央行周五做出决定后，日元兑美元走软，日本首席货币官员就近期外汇走势发出警告。【原文：Japan’s chief currency official sent a warning on recent foreign exchange moves, after the yen weakened against the dollar following Friday’s Bank of Japan decision.】

item.title: 韩国早期贸易数据显示出口保持增长
item.description: 在半导体和无线通信设备需求强劲的支撑下，韩国的出口在 12 月份的前几周继续扩大，但由于面临美国提高关税，整体增长速度有所放缓。【原文：South Korea’s exports continued to expand in the first weeks of December, supported by strong semiconductor and wireless communication equipment demand, though the overall pace of gains slowed as the country faces higher tariffs from the US.】

item.title: 白银受降息押注和地缘政治纷争影响屡创新高
item.description: 由于地缘政治紧张局势加剧以及对美联储明年进一步降息的预期，白银升至创纪录水平，黄金走高。【原文：Silver rose to a record and gold edged higher on heightened geopolitical tensions and expectations for more Federal Reserve rate cuts next year.】

item.title: 中国消费股因需求疲软连创新低
item.description: 在经济低迷和政策不确定性的背景下，分析师预计中国消费类股票将继续走低。【原文：Chinese consumer stocks are headed for their longest-ever stretch of annual underperformance, and analysts expect the trajectory to continue amid a sluggish economy and policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 中国推动人民币升值以保护出口商，抑制套利交易
item.description: 人民币自 4 月份以来的升值速度恰到好处，抵消了持有高收益美元带来的任何好处，并使人民币兑美元汇率有望在明年 3 月底达到 7。【原文：The Chinese yuan’s appreciation since April is unfolding at just the right pace to neutralize any benefits from holding higher-yielding dollars — and puts it on course to hit 7 against its US counterpart by the end of March next year.】

item.title: 美国在委内瑞拉封锁行动中追捕第三艘油轮，石油价格上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普加强了对委内瑞拉的封锁，美军在首次捕获一艘油轮后的几周内登上了一艘油轮，并追击另一艘油轮，石油随之上涨。【原文：Oil rose as President Donald Trump intensified a blockade on Venezuela, with US forces boarding one tanker and pursuing another within weeks of first capturing a vessel.】

item.title: 中国芯片制造商接连上市后争相上市
item.description: 中国的芯片制造商正踊跃进入首次公开募股（IPO）市场，筹集资金，这对中国实现技术自立和赢得全球人工智能竞赛的目标至关重要。【原文：Chinese chipmakers are rushing to the IPO market, raising funds that are key to the nation’s goal of technological self-reliance and winning the global race on artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 好莱坞认为谁会收购华纳兄弟？
item.description: 我们请 700 多位业内专家评选出了最佳流媒体服务、最差首席执行官和下一位电影巨星。【原文：We asked more than 700 industry experts to name the best streaming service, worst CEO and next big movie star.】

item.title: 无人机盾牌公司在股票销售引发愤怒后制定高管持股政策
item.description: 在公司高层领导的一系列撤资引发投资者反弹之后，DroneShield Ltd. 将为所有董事和高级管理人员制定强制性最低持股政策。【原文：DroneShield Ltd. will set up a mandatory minimum shareholding policy for all directors and senior managers after a series of divestments from the firm’s top leadership sparked investor backlash.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因年底反弹希望而走高：市场综述
item.description: 随着交易商为假期做准备，亚洲股市周五追随美国股市的涨势，有望以积极的姿态开盘。【原文：Asian equity markets are poised for a positive open, tracking gains in US stocks on Friday as traders gear up for the holiday period.】

item.title: 据报道新西兰已与印度达成贸易协议
item.description: 据包括 BusinessDesk 和新西兰广播电台在内的当地媒体援引未具名官员的话报道，新西兰已与印度敲定自由贸易协定。【原文：New Zealand has finalized a free-trade agreement with India, local media including BusinessDesk and Radio NZ reported, citing unidentified officials.】

item.title: 数以千计的新人推动人工智能数据中心淘金热
item.description:
随着众多其他参与者纷纷涌入人工智能领域，大科技公司在人工智能基础设施领域的主导地位正在缩小，并将对全球经济产生影响。【原文：

Big Tech's dominance of AI infrastructure is shrinking as a host of other players pile into the arena — with global economic consequences.

】

item.title: 首席财务官发言：雪佛龙和生物技术先驱的直言不讳
item.description:
石油巨头的财务总监艾米尔-邦纳和Alnylam公司的杰夫-波顿谈论了2026年以及各自公司的未来。【原文：

The oil major’s finance chief Eimear Bonner and Alnylam’s Jeff Poulton talk about 2026 and what’s ahead for their companies.

】

item.title: 印尼急于弥补赤字，富裕家庭面临税务审计
item.description: 印尼正试图通过对富人和大企业进行额外纳税审查，在年底前填补异常严重的收入缺口。【原文：Indonesia is seeking to plug an unusually deep revenue shortfall before year-end by scrutinizing wealthy individuals and big businesses for extra tax payments.】
